content.description: Start with both hands in the seam and pull onto the boulder with terrible feet. Bust to the pancake slopers and drift out left to easier moves before topping out.
content.location: This boulder is sitting on top of the Grovelfest Boulder.

content.description: Start with a left hand sloper on the lip of the boulder and a right hand crimp. Pull onto the boulder and do a move out left to a dishy crimp. Reach up right hand to a good high crimp with a thumb catch. Surmount the top of the boulder with bad feet and a lot of groveling. The name says it all.
content.location: Immediately in between Ninja Squirrel and The Perch.

content.description: Start with right hand on the big, flat sidepull and left hand on any of the small, sharp crimps you choose. Figure out how to pull onto the boulder with terrible feet and make one hard move to the long crimp jug. Top out.

Start with left hand on the arete and right hand underclinging the low lip. Climb the rounded boulder using the arete and crimps on the face until you can reach out right to the long incut crimp jug. Get your right foot up on the crimp jug and top out. The rock left of the arete/crack is off.
SDS on the massive jug. Do a long move to crimps on the lip of the boulder. Top out.

Inspired by Shadow's efforts!Start left hand on a good edge and right hand on a flaky side pull on the arete/crack. Use a high left foot smear and establish on the boulder. Using the arete/crack and crimps on the face, climb the slab. Everything right of the crack is off.
content.location: The leftmost line on the Grovelfest boulder, directly right of Ninja Squirrel

content.description: Huge, round boulder in between Ninja Squirrel and The Perch boulder.
